details.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet18 --dataset CIFAR10 --k ${k} --exp-mode prune --exp-name resnet18_ratio${k}_std_auto --trainer base --val-method base --resume results/resnet18/resnet18_ratio${k}_std_auto/prune/latest_exp/checkpoint/checkpoint.pth.tar --scaled-score-init --result-dir results --use_trainable_router --router_checkpoint_path results/pretrained/resnet18_adv_pretrain.pth.tar --router_arch resnet18
